meanings.definition: Outstanding or remarkable in a particular capacity.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared an extraordinaire meal for the special occasion.
meanings.sent2: The sunset was truly extraordinaire, painting the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: The extraordinaire cake was so delicious that it disappeared within minutes.
meanings.sent4: Her extraordinaire talent for painting brought life to the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The extraordinaire view from the mountaintop took their breath away.

meanings.definition: A person with exceptional skills or talents in a specific field.
meanings.sent1: She is an extraordinaire in the world of music, captivating audiences with her performances.
meanings.sent2: The extraordinaire of the art world was known for his unique sculptures.
meanings.sent3: The extraordinaire of the kitchen whipped up a feast fit for a king.
meanings.sent4: He was an extraordinaire on the basketball court, making impossible shots look easy.
meanings.sent5: The extraordinaire of storytelling kept the children spellbound with his tales.
